subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer raced to his first victory on a road course, and first with Michael Waltrip Racing, holding off Kurt Busch in the Nascar Sprint Cup race in Sonoma, Calif.
snippet: Clint Bowyer raced to his first victory on a road course, and first with Michael Waltrip Racing, holding off Kurt Busch in the Nascar Sprint Cup race in Sonoma, Calif.
